mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(D.N_ID_ACTA) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTAS C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTA_ACUERDO D ON C.N_ID_ACTA = D.N_ID_ACTA WHERE A.N_ID_CASO = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(D.N_ID_ACTOR) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_ACTOR C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR D ON C.N_ID_ACTOR = D.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE D.C_SUBTIPO2EMPRESA = '01' AND D.C_SUBTIPO3EMPRESA = '01' AND A.C_CODIGOCASO = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(distinct N_ID_VICTIMAS) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD_VICTIMA D ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = D.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD WHERE C.C_TIPO = 'AC' AND D.C_TIPO = '01' AND D.C_TIPOESTADO = '02' AND A.C_CODIGOCASO = #{value}

SELECT A.*, B.C_DESCDPTO, M.C_DESCPROV, N.C_DESCDSTRO, C.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO TIPOCASO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO C ON A.C_TIPOCASO = C.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND C.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 90 LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DPTO B ON A.C_IDDEPART = B.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_PROV M ON A.C_IDPROV = M.C_ID_PROV AND B.C_ID_DPTO = M.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DSTRO N ON A.C_IDDISTR = N.C_ID_DSTRO AND B.C_ID_DPTO = N.C_ID_DPTO AND M.C_ID_PROV = N.C_ID_PROV WHERE A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(A.D_FECHAINICIO, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(A.D_FECHAINICIO, 'MM') = #{mes} ORDER BY B.C_DESCDPTO DESC

SELECT A.*, B.C_DESCDPTO, M.C_DESCPROV, N.C_DESCDSTRO, C.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO TIPOCASO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO C ON A.C_TIPOCASO = C.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND C.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 90 LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DPTO B ON A.C_IDDEPART = B.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_PROV M ON A.C_IDPROV = M.C_ID_PROV AND B.C_ID_DPTO = M.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DSTRO N ON A.C_IDDISTR = N.C_ID_DSTRO AND B.C_ID_DPTO = N.C_ID_DPTO AND M.C_ID_PROV = N.C_ID_PROV WHERE A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(A.D_FECHAFIN, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(A.D_FECHAFIN, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C_TIPOESTADO = '06' ORDER BY B.C_DESCDPTO DESC

SELECT A.*, B.C_DESCDPTO, M.C_DESCPROV, N.C_DESCDSTRO, C.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO TIPOCASO, C.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO FASECASO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO C ON A.C_TIPOCASO = C.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND C.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 90 LEFT JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO D ON A.C_TIPODIALOGO = D.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND D.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 210 LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DPTO B ON A.C_IDDEPART = B.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_PROV M ON A.C_IDPROV = M.C_ID_PROV AND B.C_ID_DPTO = M.C_ID_DPTO LEFT JOIN SIMCO_UBIGEO_DSTRO N ON A.C_IDDISTR = N.C_ID_DSTRO AND B.C_ID_DPTO = N.C_ID_DPTO AND M.C_ID_PROV = N.C_ID_PROV WHERE A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_TIPOESTADO = '04' ORDER BY B.C_DESCDPTO DESC
